subject: World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
Soccer
Corruption (Institutional)
lead_paragraph: The world governing body of soccer not only has to find a new president, it also has to change its culture, which is shrouded in secrecy, corruption and self-enrichment.
snippet: The world governing body of soccer not only has to find a new president, it also has to change its culture, which is shrouded in secrecy, corruption and self-enrichment.
